question: What is the theme of the 15th G20 Summit of the year 2020?
option1: Realising the Opportunities of the 21st Century for All
answer: Realising the Opportunities of the 21st Century for All
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi is to attend the two-day virtual 15th G20 Summit, which is being chaired by Saudi Arabia.
The theme of the summit is "Realising the Opportunities of the 21st Century for All”. This summit is the second meeting of the G20 Leaders, this year. The last G20 Extraordinary Leaders’ summit was held in March 2020.
